About

Hello! I am Rahul Singh, a passionate and driven fourth-year student at GL Bajaj Institute of Technology and Management. My journey in tech has been fueled by a deep interest in advanced data structures and algorithms (DSA) and frontend development. Over the past few years, I've immersed myself in solving complex problems, having tackled over 400 questions on LeetCode and more than 200 on GeeksforGeeks. This rigorous practice has not only sharpened my problem-solving skills but also deepened my understanding of computational concepts. In addition to my DSA expertise, I have a solid foundation in frontend development. I have worked on various projects, utilizing HTML, CSS, and modern frameworks to create visually appealing and functional web applications. My commitment to learning and staying updated with the latest technologies drives me to continually enhance my skills and explore new challenges. I am excited about leveraging my knowledge and skills in future opportunities and contributing to innovative projects that push the boundaries of technology.
